query: What is prepaid datasim plan available?

results.contentMarkdown:
## DataSIM plan made for your freedom

Prepaid 5G DataSIM 65

RM65

Valid for 28 days

##### Perfect for: **Travel, gaming, gatherings**

##### What's included:



**Stay connected** **with massive 500GB 5G/4G Internet**



Share, stream, and work **with 100Mbps high-speed Internet** anywhere

[Get it now](#)





## Frequently asked questions

**Where can I sign up for Postpaid DataSIM?**

**Can I make calls or SMS with Postpaid DataSIM?**

**What is the download speed for Postpaid DataSIM?**

[Full FAQs](https://help.celcomdigi.com/en/support/solutions/articles/70000676067-faq-celcomdigi-postpaid-datasim)

## Sign up for the essential 5G experience today

Postpaid 5G 40 SE

Upgraded

100GB\*

RM40

5G/4G Internet

per month

##### Perfect for: **Budget-conscious basic users**

##### What's included:



[**eSIM now available**](/esim)



[**Essential**](https://help.celcomdigi.com/en/support/solutions/articles/70000657849-faq-celcomdigi-postpaid-5g-plans) 5G speed



80GB\*\* 5G/4G Internet



**FREE** extra 20GB (5G/4G) with 12 months contract​



Unlimited calls

[Buy now](#)

Mega Add-Ons

Postpaid 5G 60 SE

Upgraded

235GB\*

RM60

5G/4G Internet

per month

##### Perfect for: **Value-seeking practical users**

##### What's included:



[**eSIM now available**](/esim)



[**Essential**](https://help.celcomdigi.com/en/support/solutions/articles/70000657849-faq-celcomdigi-postpaid-5g-plans) 5G speed



200GB\*\* 5G/4G Internet



**FREE** extra 35GB (5G/4G) with 12 months contract​



**FREE** 6-months 300Mbps Fibre



Up to 2 [Family lines](/postpaid/family)



Unlimited calls

[Buy now](#)





Notes:

\*Quota(s) displayed are applicable only when subscribed to 12-month contract.

\*\*Displayed quota is available throughout the promo period.​

-   Postpaid 5G 60 SE can only sign up Postpaid Family SE as supplementary lines.



Mega Add-Ons

Unlock more value — from just RM1/month

[Learn more](/postpaid/mega-add-ons)

# Need Postpaid 5G line for your family?

Get Family lines with your principal Postpaid 5G SE plan at only RM30/mth.​

Unlimited calls

[Learn more](/postpaid-family#plans)

![CelcomDigi Postpaid | Postpaid plans with unlimited Internet, free fibre, and 5G phones​](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/637c596725cb8b7f82fe360b/65dbf81ed1020a8f3a7f7805_CelcomDigi_Postpaid_AllIn_Web_StorytellingBanner_1000x1000.webp)

## Check out more CelcomDigi Postpaid 5G plans with Unlimited 5G/4G Internet, FREE Fibre & latest 5G phones.​

query: What safety features does CelcomDigi offer?

results.contentMarkdown:
## We take your safety seriously.

[



### Secure sign-in, verified identity



](#)

### Secure sign-in, verified identity

Fast, secure access with Face ID or fingerprint — tied to your NRIC or Passport for peace of mind. All your CelcomDigi lines and services stay protected under one trusted account, viewable only to you.



[

### Your trusted access to CelcomDigi



](#)

### Your trusted access to CelcomDigi

The CelcomDigi app is your secure way to connect with us. Every transaction is safe, every offer is official, every interaction trusted — all through your verified account.



[

### Linked to your device. Protected from everyone else.



](#)

### Linked to your device. Protected from everyone else.

Only one device can use your CelcomDigi app at a time, keeping your account safe from unauthorised access.



Essentials

## Everyday tasks, made easy.

[

## All your connections, one app

Prepaid, postpaid, fibre, family, and supplementary lines — all in one app.

](#steps-start)[

## Pay bills in seconds

Skip queues. Just tap and pay.

](#steps1)[

## Auto-reload magic

Never run out of credit again.

](#steps2)[
